amendment.description: To establish a United States-India scientific cooperative threat reduction program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5180 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5180 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S11002-11003; text: CR S11003) To establish a United States-India scientific cooperative threat reduction program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5180 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5180 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
